title: 'Nation remembers': Shah slams oppn's uproar over new bills; cites Indira-era amendment
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah criticized the opposition for opposing bills aimed at removing ministers facing serious criminal charges. Shah highlighted Prime Minister Narendra Modi's commitment to fighting political corruption. He mentioned the introduction of a constitutional amendment to ensure ministers cannot govern from jail. The bills have been referred to a Joint Committee of Parliament.

title: 'I was in shock': Delhi CM Rekha Gupta's first reaction after attack
content: Delhi CM Rekha Gupta was attacked during a public hearing. She addressed the incident on X, vowing to continue serving the public. The accused, Sakariya Rajeshbhai Khimjibhai, has been arrested. He has a criminal record. Police are investigating the incident as a planned conspiracy. Security measures for CM Gupta may be reviewed.

title: Foxconn shift: No longer Apple’s iPhone factory floor; now building this AI technology
content: Foxconn, known for iPhone production, is changing its business. The company is now focusing on artificial intelligence. It is building AI servers for cloud computing and generative AI. Demand for AI infrastructure is increasing. Foxconn is partnering with Nvidia, Supermicro, and Dell. This move positions Foxconn as a key player in enterprise hardware.

title: 'Going back to medieval times': Rahul slams new bills tabled in Lok Sabha
content: Rahul Gandhi criticized the Centre's new bills proposing the removal of elected officials facing serious criminal charges, likening it to medieval times. He questioned the sudden resignation and silence of former Vice President Jagdeep Dhankhar. Gandhi also voiced support for INDIA bloc’s Vice-Presidential candidate, Sudershan Reddy, expressing confidence in his strong campaign.

title: Maharashtra poll row: FIR against psephologist Sanjay Kumar; accused of 'spreading false info'
content: Sanjay Kumar, a psephologist with Lokniti-CSDS, faces legal trouble in Nagpur, Maharashtra, after an FIR was filed against him for allegedly spreading false information related to the assembly elections. The complaint cites multiple sections of the BNS following controversial social media posts.

title: Bill Gates on interviews: Why should we hire you; strengths, weaknesses
content: Bill Gates shares his insights on tackling tough job interview questions, emphasizing the importance of showcasing motivation, adaptability, and problem-solving skills. He advises candidates to demonstrate their value, self-awareness, and ambition while aligning their goals with the company's mission. Gates encourages authenticity and preparation to transform interviews into career opportunities.

title: 'I've settled six wars': Trump calls Netanyahu 'war hero'; says he is one too
content: Donald Trump praised Benjamin Netanyahu for ordering strikes on Iranian nuclear sites. Trump called Netanyahu a war hero. He also suggested he deserved the same title. These comments followed Israeli airstrikes on Iranian nuclear facilities. The US also deployed bombs against Iran's Fordo facility. Trump claimed to have eased tensions in several global conflicts.

title: Pro-American ideologies pre-requisite for visa, green card? What US agency said
content: Amidst growing concerns, the Trump administration's social media vetting and 'America First' policy are sparking division. Oklahoma plans to screen teachers from liberal states for 'woke' views. Trump criticized museums, including the Smithsonian and the National Museum of African American History and Culture, for focusing on negativity and slavery.

title: Arjun Tendulkar engaged to Saaniya Chandok: Has Sachin’s son shared anything on Instagram?
content: Arjun Tendulkar is reportedly engaged to Saaniya Chandok, though the Tendulkar family has not officially confirmed the news. The intimate ceremony was family-oriented, connecting the Tendulkar and Chandok families. Arjun, who plays for Mumbai Indians and represents Goa in domestic cricket, balances his personal milestone with his developing cricketing career.

title: ‘Rockets to Wall Street’: Musk’s teen prodigy leaves SpaceX; joins Citadel Securities
content: Kairan Quazi, the 16-year-old prodigy who previously worked at SpaceX, is now joining Citadel Securities as a developer in New York City. He chose the quantitative trading firm over AI labs and big tech companies, drawn to the fast-paced environment and intellectual challenges. Quazi will be working on global trading infrastructure, embracing Wall Street's meritocratic culture.

title: Chahal vs Dhanashree | 'Million feelings ...': Spinner posts a four-word cryptic message
content: Following Dhanashree Verma's emotional revelations about their divorce and criticism of Yuzvendra Chahal's attire during the court hearing, the cricketer has responded with a cryptic Instagram post. Chahal shared pictures of himself with the caption "Million feelings, Zero words," adding another layer to the public saga. Dhanashree's podcast comments and Chahal's reaction have ignited a social media storm.

title: From Murugadoss being slammed to Alia's anti-drug video- Here's top 5 ent news
content: The entertainment industry is currently filled with news. Salman Khan's fans criticized A R Murugadoss for lateness remarks. Alia Bhatt's anti-drug video faced backlash, leading to comment section shutdown. Faissal Khan wants Aamir Khan to take a DNA test. Joseph Radhik shared his favorite photo from Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma's wedding. Swara Bhasker's sexuality remarks have sparked controversy online.

title: Stairway to heaven? The real reason Trump wants peace in Ukraine
content: President Trump, twice impeached, once convicted, and forever a master of spectacle, wants to end the war in Ukraine because he wants to go to heaven."I want to try and get to heaven, if possible," he said on live television. "I'm hearing I'm not doing well. I'm really at the bottom of the totem pole."With that, the most powerful man on Earth confessed that even he was afraid of the next world. Trump was not playing 4D chess. He was bargaining with God.​

title: Lok Sabha ruckus: TMC MP says BJP's Bittu, Rijiju 'attacked, pushed' her
content: Amidst uproar in Lok Sabha over three contentious bills introduced by Amit Shah, Trinamool Congress (TMC) alleged that Union Ministers Ravneet Singh Bittu and Kiren Rijiju assaulted their female MPs. TMC MPs Mitali Bagh and Kalyan Banerjee claimed the ministers physically attacked and pushed them during the protest.

title: French streamer Jean Pormanove dies at 46, fans outraged
content: French streamer Jean Pormanove, known for his extreme IRL broadcasts, tragically died at 46, sparking grief and outrage. His death followed a grueling Kick marathon, raising concerns about unsafe streaming culture. Fans are sharing disturbing clips, igniting debate on platform accountability and creator safety in the face of toxic content.

title: 'I resigned before...': Amit Shah hits back at Venugopal's 'morality' attack
content: Amit Shah addressed past accusations in Parliament. This happened during a discussion about new bills. Congress leader KC Venugopal questioned Shah's 2010 arrest. Shah stated he resigned before his arrest. He cited moral responsibility. Shah also mentioned his subsequent acquittal. The bills propose changes related to corruption charges against public officials and amendments to existing laws.

title: Online Gaming Bill 2025 passed in LS: Ban on real money gaming; boost for esports
content: Lok Sabha passed the Promotion and Regulation of Online Gaming Bill, 2025, amidst opposition protests. The bill aims to regulate online gaming, delighting esports but alarming real money gaming platforms. It proposes a central regulatory body, potentially impacting cricket sponsorships and endorsements. Esports anticipates a boost, gaining legitimacy as it prepares for its Olympic debut in 2027.

title: 'Naidu, Nitish most fearful': Raut's big claim on govt's 'removing PM, CMs' bill
content: Sanjay Raut claims the Centre introduced new bills to deter Nitish Kumar and Chandrababu Naidu from withdrawing support to the NDA government, fearing their opposition to provisions allowing the removal of leaders arrested for serious crimes.

title: Rankings: 35-yr-old South African at No 1; 2 Indians in Top 10, Namibia spinner makes in Top 5
content: Keshav Maharaj has regained the top spot in the ICC ODI bowling rankings, surpassing Kuldeep Yadav, who now ranks third. Namibia's Bernard Scholtz made a significant leap to fourth, marking a milestone for Associate cricket. Shubman Gill remains the top ODI batter, while India's Abhishek Sharma and Tilak Varma lead the T20I batting rankings, showcasing India's dominance in both formats.

title: Attack on Delhi CM: Attempt to murder case filed; accused caught on cam
content: Delhi Chief Minister Rekha Gupta was attacked during a Jan Sunvai, prompting immediate police action and a medical examination for Gupta. The assailant, identified as Rajesh Khimji, had previously been seen surveilling Gupta's residence. While the accused is in custody and his background is being verified, Gupta's condition is stable, and she intends to continue her scheduled programs.

title: Infosys hands out higher bonus! Employees get average 80% payout
content: Infosys has distributed performance bonuses for the April-June quarter to eligible employees, with payouts averaging 80% and ranging from 75-89%. This marks an improvement compared to the previous quarter's disbursement.

title: Want to live longer? Research says THIS simple habit adds years to life
content: At 100 years old, Ruth exemplifies the benefits of exercise in old age, routinely walking four miles daily. Her dedication, along with a healthy diet and ample sleep, inspires others to prioritize their well-being. Research supports her lifestyle, highlighting walking's role in preventing age-related diseases and promoting overall health, proving it's never too late to start.

title: Asia Cup | 'Seems strange': Ex-India batter slams Shreyas Iyer’s exclusion
content: Robin Uthappa has voiced his surprise over Shreyas Iyer's omission from India's Asia Cup squad, despite Iyer's strong performances, including being the leading run-scorer in the Champions Trophy and guiding his IPL teams to successive finals. Chief selector Ajit Agarkar defended the decision, citing squad size limitations.

title: Stephen A. Smith defends Trump; points to Biden for Ukraine-Russia conflict
content: Stephen A. Smith, on his podcast, defended Donald Trump, asserting he didn't initiate the Russia-Ukraine war. Smith argued that Joe Biden, as president during the full-scale conflict, bears responsibility. He further contended that decisions by Barack Obama, regarding Crimea, and Bill Clinton, concerning Ukraine's nuclear disarmament, contributed to the current crisis, emphasizing the importance of upholding promises to Ukraine.

title: Spying for Pakistan: Man detained in Jaisalmer; 4th case from district
content: In Jaisalmer, a 30-year-old man named Jivan Khan has been detained on suspicion of spying for Pakistan. Military Intelligence apprehended Khan, who previously worked at a restaurant within the military area, after he attempted to enter an Army station. Questioning revealed he has relatives in Pakistan.

title: Cricketer penalised for obscenity: Australia spinner reprimanded by ICC - see details
content: Australian leg-spinner Adam Zampa has been reprimanded by the ICC for using inappropriate language during the first ODI against South Africa. Zampa admitted to the offense, which occurred after a misfield. He received one demerit point. South Africa won the match by 98 runs, with Keshav Maharaj taking five wickets.

title: 'If Indian goods can't go to US, they can ...': Russia slams Trump tariffs; calls pressure over oil 'unjustified'
content: Prime Minister Modi and Russian President Putin are scheduled to meet in New Delhi to bolster trade ties, focusing on improved payment systems and the removal of trade barriers. Russia aims to strengthen its economic partnership with India amidst global challenges.

title: Chess | Drama! Dutch No 1 Anish Giri blocks Carlsen's long-time coach on social media
content: A social media clash erupted between Anish Giri and Peter Heine Nielsen after Giri commented on D Gukesh's drawing tendencies. Nielsen criticised Giri's view on player mentality, sparking a heated exchange where Giri referenced Carlsen's playing style and Nielsen's alleged bias. Despite the feud, Giri remains in strong form, recently finishing as runner-up in the Chennai Grand Masters 2025.

title: 'War 2' box office collection day 7: Film to cross Rs 200 crore in India
content: Released on August 14th amidst a box office clash with 'Coolie,' 'War 2' initially lagged behind, earning Rs 51.5 crore on its opening day compared to 'Coolie's' Rs 65 crore. Despite decent weekend numbers, 'War 2' experienced a significant drop on Monday, its fifth day.

title: Cricket | Kohli, Rohit disappear from latest ODI rankings. What happened?
content: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli had curiously dropped out of the latest ICC ODI rankings, with Shubman Gill in the lead among Indian batters. According to ICC rules, players are removed from rankings if they haven't played within a qualifying period, which is 9-12 months for ODIs.

title: 'Moment of pride': Shah approves name change; Jalalabad to be now called ...
content: The Union Home Minister, Amit Shah, has approved the renaming of Jalalabad in Uttar Pradesh's Shahjahanpur district to Parshurampuri. This decision follows a letter sent to the state's Chief Secretary, indicating the central government's approval.

title: Kambli health update | 'He needs your love and support': Brother hopeful of recovery
content: Former Indian cricketer Vinod Kambli is facing health challenges, battling a urinary infection and speech difficulties. His brother, Virendra, shared an emotional update, revealing Kambli's slow recovery and ongoing treatment after a recent hospital stay. Despite financial struggles and personal challenges, Kambli's family remains his strongest support.

title: Upset over SC order on stray dogs? Man who 'attacked' Delhi CM did 'recce'; how incident unfolded
content: Delhi Chief Minister Rekha Gupta was allegedly attacked during her Jan Sunwai, causing chaos. A man, identified as Rajesh Bhai Khimji Bhai Sakriya, reportedly grabbed her hand, prompting immediate intervention by attendees and security. Virendra Sachdeva, Delhi BJP president, called it a security breach. Gupta, though in shock, is stable and committed to her work.

title: 'Bill to remove PM, CMs': Tharoor breaks from party line; calls proposal 'reasonable'
content: Shashi Tharoor supports the new bills regarding ministers' removal upon imprisonment. The bills propose removing ministers jailed for 30 days on serious charges. This stance differs from other Congress leaders like Priyanka Gandhi Vadra, who criticizes the bill. She calls it draconian and anti-democratic. The proposed law mandates resignation for PMs, CMs, and ministers detained for offenses with five-year sentences.

title: Over 7.6 lakh Indians went abroad in 2024: STEM courses lead
content: Over 7.6 lakh Indian students pursued global education in 2024, marking a slight decrease from 2023's 8.95 lakh. The US, Canada, and the UK remain top destinations, while Germany and Russia gain traction. STEM, AI, and business courses are highly sought after. Government initiatives like MRQs and the ICWF support students, but visa issues and rising costs pose challenges.

title: Historic! Praggnanandhaa becomes new World No 3 after beating Gukesh - who holds the top spots?
content: Indian chess player R Praggnanandhaa has achieved a milestone. He defeated D Gukesh at the Sinquefield Cup. Praggnanandhaa is now ranked World No. 3. He has a live rating of 2784.1 points. Only Magnus Carlsen and Hikaru Nakamura are ahead of him. Praggnanandhaa shares the tournament lead with Levon Aronian. The Sinquefield Cup has a prize pool of USD 350,000.

title: Online Gaming Bill tabled in Lok Sabha: Government cracks down on digital betting
content: The Promotion and Regulation of Online Gaming Bill, 2025, has been introduced in the Lok Sabha, aiming to regulate online gaming by banning real-money games while promoting e-sports and social games. The legislation seeks to protect youth from predatory apps and prevent addiction and financial risks.

title: What is PM Rozgar Yojana? How Rs 15,000 incentive scheme for employees works
content: The Narendra Modi government has launched the Pradhan Mantri Viksit Bharat Rozgar Yojana. This scheme aims to boost job creation and social security. The government will provide incentives up to Rs 15,000 for new employees registered with EPFO. Employers will also receive support for creating new jobs. The scheme aims to generate 3.5 crore employment opportunities.

title: Florida crash: Harjinder Singh, who killed 3, fails English, road tests
content: Harjinder Singh, an Indian immigrant trucker, faces charges for a fatal Florida crash after a reckless U-turn. Despite failing English and road sign tests, he obtained commercial driver's licenses in California and Washington. The incident has ignited a political clash between the Trump administration and California Governor Gavin Newsom over immigration and licensing policies, highlighting concerns about public safety.

title: Asia Cup: How six-hitting changed T20 cricket; India’s surge in the big-hit race
content: T20 cricket has undergone a six-hitting revolution, transforming batting from risk-averse accumulation to power-driven aggression. India, once lagging behind, now match the world’s best with a six every 12 balls in 2024. With IPL and internationals fuelling the trend, six-hitting is now the currency of modern T20 cricket.

title: FASTag Annual Pass: How to activate online via Rajmargyatra app
content: The National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) introduced the FASTag Annual Pass, streamlining toll payments for highway travelers. Over five lakh vehicle owners registered within days, benefiting from seamless, faster toll transactions. Initially for commercial vehicles, it now includes private vehicles, offering convenience, time-saving, and transparency with a fixed validity of one year or 200 trips.

title: Projecting next year's QB market: Most likely scenarios and long shot possibilities for 12 NFL teams
content: We picked teams with some level of QB1 uncertainty for 2026 and projected two potential outcomes for each: one likely, one not so likely.

title: Agent unsure of Richardson's future with Colts
content: Anthony Richardson Sr.'s agent reacted with disappointment with the Colts' decision to name Daniel Jones the starting quarterback and said he's unsure of his client's future with the team.

title: Scheffler odds to win shortest since Tiger's in '09
content: Rory McIlroy, a three-time FedEx Cup champion, has the second-shortest odds to win this week's Tour Championship in Atlanta, and his odds are still five times longer than Scottie Scheffler's.

title: Yanks make history with 2nd 9-HR game of season
content: After a lengthy rain delay, Giancarlo Stanton hit two home runs and the Yankees matched a franchise record with nine long balls Tuesday night in a convincing 13-3 victory over the Rays, an effort the slugger labeled as "awesome to see."

title: Saints QB competition to continue, Moore says
content: The Saints are taking their quarterback decision down to the wire, with coach Kellen Moore saying they want to continue the competition between Tyler Shough and Spencer Rattler through next week.

title: Texas QB Manning says future plans still unclear
content: Texas quarterback Arch Manning says his playing future -- whether it's remaining with the Longhorns after this season or entering the NFL draft -- has yet to be decided despite recent comments by his grandfather Archie Manning.

title: Royals' Witt joins elite company with 100th HR
content: Royals shortstop Bobby Witt Jr. hit his 100th career home run Tuesday, becoming the youngest player in franchise history to reach that mark.

title: Chávez deported to Mexico for alleged cartel ties
content: Julio César Chávez Jr., 39, arrested days after his fight with Jake Paul, has been deported to Mexico, where he's wanted for alleged cartel ties, following his detention in the U.S. for allegedly overstaying his visa and lying on a green card application.

title: Rory: Took home 1,100 Masters flags after win
content: Rory McIlroy said he took all 1,100 pin flags from the Masters Shop after winning at Augusta National in April. "I've waited 17 years to sign that flag in the middle, and I will never complain about doing it."

title: 👀 Indiana's mascot resurrected after 50 years!
content: Indiana's original bison mascot was described as "the devil with a cheerleader in it" -- but now a new version has risen from the ashes thanks to a passionate professor, underground student government action, a campus bar and more.

title: College Football 2025: Ranking the best players from 1-100
content: Who's the top college football player in the nation? Our experts rank the top 100 ahead of the season.

title: 32 pick projections, eight months out: Yates’ early NFL mock draft of Round 1 has some surprises
content: Could Arch Manning go No. 1? Will QBs dominate the first round? Which teams could land playmakers? Field Yates projects next year's opening 32 picks.

title: Why Liberty-Lynx is the best rivalry in the WNBA -- even when they're not 100% healthy
content: Minnesota and New York met four times in 20 days. Here are five things we learned in their WNBA Finals rematches.

title: Don't sleep on them: The 43 players who could break out in 2025
content: We ranked the top 100 college football players, but which other players might do big things this season?

title: Can DJ Lagway become Florida's next great quarterback?
content: In his sophomore season, the signal-caller will try to lead Florida to its first College Football Playoff appearance.

title: Burrow, McConkey among Matt Bowen's top 10 draft targets, Warren among late fliers
content: Matt Bowen ranks the most common players he has been drafting this summer and includes a handful of late-rounders to put on the radar.

title: Are the Colts, Anthony Richardson headed for a breakup? Is there a trade market? What's next?
content: Naming Daniel Jones the starter might have irrevocably damaged the relationship between the Colts and Richardson? Here's what to know.

title: Tour Championship rankings: From Scottie Scheffler all the way to No. 30
content: Who comes in at No. 2 behind Scheffler? Where do U.S. Ryder Cup hopefuls rank? We break down the entire Tour Championship field.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool ready £130m move for Isak
content: Liverpool have sanctioned a £130m move to land Newcastle United striker Alexander Isak. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: The little-known FIFA rule that gives Isak all the leverage over Newcastle
content: Breaking down a little-known FIFA rule called Article 17. It could be the key to unlocking Isak's future.

title: Who could be the breakout U21 player on each Premier League club?
content: With a host of young players impressing in preseason, we look at the next breakout stars under the age of 21 from all 20 Premier League teams.

title: NBA milestones: Landmarks to watch this season for LeBron, Jokic and others
content: Important milestones to watch ahead of the 2025-26 season, including another historic season from LeBron James and Nikola Jokic.

title: AFC East betting preview: Bills odds-on favorite to take division
content: Can anyone keep up with the Bills in the AFC East? Here are all the odds for each team in the division and our favorite bets.

title: Florida announces retro uniforms for homecoming game against Mississippi State
content: Last worn in 2021, the Gators' throwback threads offer a simplistic twist on the school's iconic blue and orange color scheme.

title: Jalen Brunson, Natalia Bryant star together in new Nike Kobe sneaker ad
content: A key feature of the new Nike Kobe 3 Protro is diamond shapes on the upper and outsole in honor of Natalia.

title: What to believe -- and not to believe in the National League
content: Milwaukee is on fire. New York is ice cold. Top players are hurt or struggling. Here's what it all means.

title: What makes Tarik Skubal and Paul Skenes the best pitchers on the planet
content: Here's what separates the Cy Young favorites from other aces, according to those who watch them most.

title: Pickups: Top prospects and save chances to add
content: The players you should be claiming off the waiver wire, including some top prospects making their MLB debuts.

title: On Camera, Man Falls Into Drain As Cover Gives Way In Maharashtra
content: A man fell into a drain in Maharashtra's Chandrapur after the cover collapsed beneath him. A video of the incident showed the man alighting from a parked scooter near a bakery with boxes in his hand.

title: How Trump's Push For 'Americanism' At The Smithsonian Is Deeply Orwellian
content: President Donald Trump has revealed his ambitions to rewrite America's official history to, in the words of the Organisation of American Historians, "reflect a glorified narrative ... while suppressing the voices of historically excluded groups."

title: Blog: Blog | When A 'Thup' Meant The World: Ode To The Beloved Red Post Box
content: The young of today do not know the charm of the handwritten word. If it came in an envelope, then it could well be a 'rakhi' from a sister, a 'tika' from mother, a dried and pressed rose bud or, even better, the fragrance of the lipstick of a beloved

title: Fireball Lights Up Night Sky In Japan
content: A flashing fireball dashed across the skies of western Japan, shocking residents and dazzling stargazers, though experts said it was a natural phenomenon and not an alien invasion.

title: Man Who Attacked Rekha Gupta "Serial Offender", Charged Several Times: Cops
content: The man who was arrested for attacking Rekha Gupta during 'Jan Sunwai' at her camp office in Civil Lines here on Wednesday is a "serial offender" and several cases have been registered against him in Rajkot in Gujarat, officials said.

title: Elderly Man Killed After Argument Over Matchbox Escalates In UP: Cops
content: A man was fatally struck on the head with an iron rod after an argument over a matchbox escalated here during late night drinking between three people, police said on Wednesday.

title: CM Rekha Gupta Attacked LIVE Updates: Police Registers Case Of Attempt To Murder After Attack On Rekha Gupta
content: Attack on CM Rekha Gupta Live News: Delhi Chief Minister Rekha Gupta was allegedly attacked during a "Jan Sunwai" programme on Thursday morning, police said, adding that the accused has been caught and is being questioned.

title: How Mumbai Monorail Became A 'White Elephant'
content: Mumbai's monorail services restarted today after two trains broke down on Tuesday evening, leaving nearly 800 passengers stranded.

title: Why Putin Had To Pay Rs 2.2 Crore In Cash To Refuel Jet In Alaska
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin had to pay nearly $250,000 (about Rs 2.2 crore) in cash to refuel three jets while returning from the United States, Secretary of State Marco Rubio said.

title: 100-Foot Flagpole At Actor Vijay's Party Meet Venue Falls On Car
content: A 100-feet flagpole erected at the venue of August 21 Tamilaga Vettri Kazhagam party conference in Tamil Nadu's Madurai collapsed on a car, heavily damaging it.

title: Bill To Ban Online Games Played With Money Passed In Lok Sabha
content: The Lok Sabha on Wednesday passed a legislation to ban online games played with money as it looks to check rising instances of addiction, money laundering and financial fraud through such applications.

title: UK Bans Sanex Shower Gel Ad Over Racial Stereotyping
content: Britain's advertising regulator banned an advert for Sanex shower gel, owned by US consumer goods group Colgate-Palmolive, for suggesting black skin was "problematic" and white skin was "superior".

title: Centre Proposes Exempting Insurance Premium From GST: Samrat Choudhary
content: The Centre has proposed exempting life and health insurance premium from GST, Bihar Deputy Chief Minister and convenor of insurance GoM Samrat Choudhary said on Wednesday.

title: Lok Sabha Passes Bill To Set Up Indian Institute of Management In Guwahati
content: The Rajya Sabha on Wednesday passed a bill to set up an Indian Institute of Management (IIM) in Guwahati with the Union government providing a capital support of Rs 550 crore.

title: Parliament Panel Flags Aviation Safety Gaps, Says "Give DGCA Full Autonomy"
content: Grant the Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA) full administrative and financial autonomy is one among twelve recommendations made by a parliamentary committee in a report reviewing India's civil aviation sector, tabled in both Houses.

title: The Pros And Cons Of Online Gaming Bill 2025
content: The Online Gaming Bill 2025 seeks to encourage e-sports and social games, while prohibiting real money gaming and online betting that could lead to addiction, financial loss, and security risks.

title: All About Cornhusker Clink, New Migrant Detention Centre Opened By Trump
content: US President Donald Trump on Tuesday announced the opening of a new migrant detention centre in Nebraska, as part of their plan to expand facilities for US Immigration and Customs Enforcement. The new facility is called the "Cornhusker Clink."

title: Russia Captures 3 More Villages In Eastern Ukraine, Says Army
content: The Russian army said Wednesday it had captured three villages in eastern Ukraine, claiming fresh territorial gains despite US-led peace efforts and a flurry of diplomacy to end the conflict.

title: Death Count In Afghanistan Bus Collision Rises To 79
content: An overcrowded bus carrying Afghans expelled from Iran crashed in western Afghanistan and at least 79 people were killed, authorities said on Wednesday.

title: Congress Leader's 'Morality' Question To Amit Shah, His 'I Resigned' Reply
content: The heated face-off  between the opposition and the government over the bills to remove elected representatives arrested on serious charges and kept in custody for over 30 days also saw a short but sharp exchange between K Venugopal and Amit Shah.

title: Football Manager 26 revealed with a new engine and Premier League license
content: football manager 26 has a release window of fall 2025 . the game was previously only possible by modding the game . it will also feature the new engine that was set to be introduced in FM25 before it was cancelled . this will see an overhaul to the game's visuals .

title: MMA divisional rankings: Can any middleweight stop Khamzat Chimaev?
content: Khamzat Chimaev becomes middleweight champion at the UFC 319 . he is undefeated and has long been expected to rise to the top . the middleweight rankings also saw two fighters enter the top 10 for the first time .

title: 'Dana White's Contender Series' Week 2: Four KOs, five contracts awarded
content: "Dana White's Contender Series" returns for season 9 on august 12 . american welterweight Ty Miller earned the first contract on the season . susurkaev knocked out murtaza Talha with a vicious kick to the liver .

title: Fantasy baseball news: Jacob deGrom scratched; Kenley Jansen dealing with injury
content: the fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . the Baltimore Orioles and Boston Red Sox enjoy a rare Wednesday day off . X-rays came back negative, but Milwaukee Brewers manager Pat Murphy indicated Ortiz fouled a ball off his knee .

title: The stat that could swing every team's 2025-26 season
content: the new national TV calendar is taking shape . the new season schedule was unveiled this past week . training camps open in just over a month . there are plenty of reasons for the Hawks optimism this season . click here for all the latest NBA news .

title: NFC East betting preview: Can anyone overtake the Eagles?
content: no team has won the NFC East in back-to-back seasons since 2001-04 . the Dallas Cowboys are the third choice at +700, followed by the New York Giants . defending champions are -160 to do just that, with the Washington Commanders next in line at +225 .

title: Waiver wire: Odyssey Sims steps up for depleted Fever backcourt
content: a long summer season is winding down . many teams have just this final week before the imaginary postseason begins next Monday . a rookie rising for the sun, as well as a vet taking on more work in the wake of injuries .

title: MMA pound-for-pound rankings: Khamzat Chimaev has arrived -- but how high in top 10?
content: Khamzat Chimaev is a middleweight champion at the pound-for-pound rankings . he landed 118 strikes in the opening round of his debut at the Octagon in 2020 . in the first round, he was back at it, building a 68-0 edge in total strikes .

title: TDP and JD(U) support the Bills but express reservation about several ‘grey areas’ in the legislations
content: The NDA allies, as per sources, were neither informed nor consulted before the government brought the three constitutional amendment Bills that seek to remove the Prime Minister, Chief Ministers and Ministers from office if they are arrested and detained for serious criminal charges

title: Cyber security laboratory soon in Tirumala, says TTD Chairman
content: Aim is to check cybercrimes related to fake darshan tickets and accommodation, says B.R. Naidu; employees belonging to alien faiths may move to other government organisations or opt for Voluntary Retirement Scheme, he says

title: Constitution (130th Amendment) Bill aims to end country’s democratic era, says Mamata
content: Trinamool Congress general secretary Abhishek Banerjee says the Bill will never pass as it requires support of two-third MPs of the House

title: Kozhikode MP flags concerns over key road projects with Gadkari
content: Issues raised include missing entry points on the Kozhikode–Palakkad Greenfield Highway, exclusion of the Kozhikode–Mysore project, and demands for underpasses and foot overbridges on the Kozhikode Bypass

title: Run special trains to ease NH 544 traffic woes, demands Benny Behanan
content: MP submits a memorandum highlighting the severe traffic chaos caused by ongoing underpass works at Amballur, Perambra, Muringoor, Koratty, and Chirangara to  Union Minister of State for Railways

title: 'Towering figure in Indian jurisprudence': Kharge introduces V-P candidate Reddy to Opposition leaders
content: Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge said the opposition parties decided to field someone who has been dedicated to constitutional principles and Reddy is one such person

title: District-level committees formed to handle compensation claims for dog bites, Kerala govt. tells HC
content: Move in compliance with the Supreme Court’s directive to replace the Siri Jagan Committee appointed by it in 2016 to adjudicate compensation for victims of dog bites

title: BJP urges government to instruct Dakshina Kannada police not to disturb festival events
content: Police should refrain from seizing mikes and sound systems during the upcoming Ganesh Chaturthi, say Opposition members

title: Special train from Hubballi to Mangaluru Central on August 26
content: South Western Railway is running the service to clear the extra rush of passengers during the festival

title: ECI is in league with BJP, losing its credibility: AAP
content: ECI list shows only one booth-level agent for the AAP, despite the party’s claim that it is contesting all 243 seats; ECI not updating list, party will name BLAs for all 90,712 booths in a month, says AAP Bihar chief

title: People displaced by airport in Hubballi seek rehabilitation, alternative sites
content: Their association urges the State government to take the requisite measures to fulfill their demands

title: CAG finds ‘gross irregularities’ in Construction Workers’ Welfare Board
content: Ineligible workers, such as tailors, clerks, weavers, and those from other professions registered as construction workers and availed themselves of benefits, says the audit institution

title: Bhavnagar school play depicting burqa-clad ‘terrorists’ triggers controversy; probe ordered
content: A video of the August 15 performance has been widely circulated on social media; members of the Muslim community demanded stern action against the teachers for depicting their community ‘in a bad light’

title: Palakkad division launches initiative to ensure safe travel for women passengers
content: Dedicated RPF teams have been deployed at five major stations in the division to identify solo women travellers, sensitise them about safety precautions, and share emergency contact details

title: Krishna rises further due to heavy rain, water discharge from Maharashtra
content: The Belagavi district administration decides to survey low-lying bridges and suggest construction of new ones

title: BJP accuses Congress government of unleashing ‘tax terrorism’ to fund guarantees
content: State government raised additional ₹52,422 crore by imposing taxes, hiking bus fares, power and water tariffs, and liquor prices, they say

title: Ration distribution resumes at Edamalakkudy
content: July’s ration was not supplied by the regular distributor since they were not provided transportation cost. Civil Supplies dept. now contracts two persons to transport items from Pettimudy to Edamalakkudy

title: With increased awareness, digital arrest cases see a drop in Karnataka
content: However, a closer analysis of the data shows that while the average money lost in a digital arrest case in 2024 was ₹20 lakh, it has risen to ₹29.5 lakh in cases registered till the end of July in 2025

title: Centre has decided to defile the Constitution by turning India into a dictatorship under PM, alleges Stalin
content: Tamil Nadu CM strongly objects to The Constitution (130th Amendment) Bill, 2025, introduced by Home Minister Amit Shah in Parliament

title: Are elected State governments at the mercy of Governors’ whims to withhold and fail Bills, Supreme Court asks Centre
content: ‘Are Governors being given total powers to sit in appeal over elected representatives?’ the CJI questioned the Centre’s interpretation of Article 200 in the Presidential Reference hearing

title: Congress will amend laws to reduce minimum age to contest Assembly polls to 21 years: Revanth
content: Says Rajiv Gandhi is an inspiration for the youth and stressed the need to reduce the minimum age to contest Assembly polls; states that Rahul Gandhi can only fulfil former PM Rajiv Gandhi’s aspirations as Prime Minister of India

title: TTD Chairman slams legal notice on Sakshi daily and TV channel
content: Accusing the media outlet of publishing and broadcasting biased and malicious reports that not only undermined his reputation but also offended the sentiments of the devotees, B.R. Naidu demands unconditional apology and payment of ₹10 crore as compensation to the TTD

title: Exhume body of 26-day-old infant and subject it to post-mortem, orders Madras High Court
content: Justices M.S. Ramesh and V. Lakshminarayanan pass the order after suspecting that the baby could have died due to milk aspiration but the mother was attempting to brush it under the carpet

title: Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu inaugurates Ratan Tata Innovation Hub and its five regional centres
content: Set up on a hub-and-spoke model, the aim is to nurture one entrepreneur in every family by extending them the required hand-holding with the support of corporate and knowledge partners, says the Chief Minister

title: India can match oil-producing nations with cheap hydrogen: Nitin Gadkari
content: Nitin Gadkari discusses India’s potential to become a global hydrogen exporter by reducing production costs

title: Government slams Opposition for ‘spreading lies’ over Maharashtra election data
content: There is one person who has deliberately spread confusion in the country and the Opposition, especially Congress, is further circulating it, says Union Education Minister Dharmendra Pradhan

title: Lok Sabha passes bill to ban online games played with money
content: The Promotion and Regulation of Online Gaming Bill, 2025, seeks to prohibit advertisements related to online money games as well as bars banks and financial institutions from facilitating or transferring funds for any of such games.

title: Inquiry committee unearths gross irregularities in appointment of professors in University of Madras
content: The Syndicate has resolved to send show-cause notices to the persons concerned under Section 17(b) of the Tamil Nadu Civil Services (Discipline and Appeal) Rules, sources in the University said

title: Kerala Cabinet nod for availing ₹1,500 crore loan from HUDCO for Life Mission scheme
content: Repayment will be done over a 15-year-period through deductions from the development funds of the local self-government institutions

title: Periye double murder convict granted parole despite opposition from victims’ families
content: The fourth accused has been granted a parole of one month, despite the objections raised by the Bekal police as well as the families of the victims

title: India celebrates clean energy milestone but coal still king
content: Coal is needed to fulfil power demands while storage capacity lags behind the surge in renewable sources of power

title: Passenger Reservation System can book 25,000 tickets per minute: Railway Minister
content: Capacity enhancement and technological upgradation is an ongoing process of Indian Railways. Presently, the booking capacity of the current PRS is about 25,000 tickets per minute, says Railway Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw

title: Class 10 student stabbed to death in Ahmedabad school
content: Following the death of the boy, a mob attacked the school, damaging its offices and assaulting the staff; Gujarat Education Minister called the death “a red signal for a civilised society”

title: Kintakuru encounter: Andhra Pradesh Government orders magisterial inquiry into killing of three Maoists
content: The police officials, family members of the deceased Maoists and doctors involved in the post-mortem are directed to appear for the inquiry to be held in Rampachodavaram on August 25

title: Parliament passes bill to set up IIM in Guwahati
content: The establishment of an IIM in Guwahati as an institution of national importance is one of the projects under the special development package provided to Assam

title: 8th accused held in Army jawan assault case at Meerut toll plaza
content: SP (Rural) Rakesh Kumar Mishra had earlier said that seven accused, identified as Sachin, Vijay, Anuj, Ankit, Suresh Rana, Ankit Sharma and Neeraj Talian alias Bittu, were arrested after CCTV footage analysis

title: 14th-century goddess idol found near Kodiveri anicut
content: The idol represents the Hindu goddess Nisumba Soodhani; it is said that the Cholas worshipped the deity before going to war

title: Rupee rises by 6 paise to close at 87.07 against U.S. dollar
content: Forex traders said easing tensions over trade tariffs and hopes of peace between Russia and Ukraine enthused investors.

title: Owaisi submits notice opposing three bills that enable removal of PM, CMs and other elected representatives
content: The [Union] government wants to turn country into a police state; it is a 1933 Gestapo moment for India: Owaisi

title: Jameis and the Big Apple (and Eli too): Winston relishes a day immersed in New York
content: jameis Winston stood on top of a red double-decker bus in the middle of Manhattan . he began belting out lines to the musical "Hamilton" with a massive smile across his face . the 31-year-old was on a tour of the city with super bowl winners and Giants legends .

title: The Unforgotten: Two QBs and the game that tied them together forever
content: quarterback ONE IS JAY KUTNER . he is a senior, 17 years old, wears no. 5 . his team is playing a preseason scrimmage against a public school . the coach is dissatisfied -- execution or effort, it hardly matters .

title: WNBA Power Rankings: Should the Dream be considered title contenders?
content: the dream are 9-3 since the All-Star break, with their two most recent losses coming by only two points . the Las Vegas Aces have won seven in a row . they have reached at least the semifinals the past six seasons .

title: What do NFL scouts think of Arch Manning and what can Texas expect from him?
content: arch Manning will get his chance to be the face of the longhorns this season . he won't get the chance to ease into the starting role as top-ranked Texas will play at defending national champion and no. 3-ranked Ohio State in its season opener on august 30 .

title: Top 10 NBA players at 2025 EuroBasket: Where Jokic and Doncic stack up abroad
content: euroBasket 2025 will feature the french and Serbian squads that Team USA beat in the knockout rounds of the 2024 Olympics . heavyweights like Serbia, Germany, France, Greece and Slovenia will have multiple NBA names on their roster . the tournament runs Aug. 27 through Sept. 14 .

title: What early issues need solving for some top Premier League clubs?
content: the first weekend of the premier league season is a momentous event, and teams spend months preparing for it . some of the country's best clubs struggled over the weekend and likely left their managers walking away with their brains full of possible tweaks and solutions . a measly 39% possession highlighted how difficult they found it to get on the ball .

title: Draft Guide: Rankings, mock drafts and analysis
content: this draft guide will serve as one-stop shop for all of our best fantasy football picks possible in every draft you're in . we have everything needed to help you draft a great team and start the season with a shot . it doesn't matter whether you have been doing this for years or are a first-timer .

title: Updated top 100 MLB prospect rankings: There's a new No. 1
content: a lot has changed since the last time we ranked the top MLB prospects . some of the prospects on the list are in new places after a busy trade deadline . this is my ranking of these players for the long term, considering their upside, risk and proximity to the big leagues .

title: Barnwell picks five NFL teams set to decline: Who could miss the playoffs entirely?
content: the Vikings have improved 31 of 38 times, or more than 81% of the time . each year, I break down the teams most likely to decline . this column has had a virtually identical success rate; after last year, it's 30 for 38 .

title: CFB Player Rank: Who should've made the top 10? What were the biggest surprises?
content: the big Ten is floating the idea of expanding the College Football Playoff to 24 or 28 teams . the college football reporters break down the entire ranking, including what players our committee missed entirely . our selection committee included Bill Connelly, David Hale, Chris Low, Adam Rittenberg and Paolo Uggetti.
